Fi En
Snowboarding in Finland and Europe

Snowboarding in Finland

There are wonderful skiing centers in Finland. I have snowboarded in Finland in Ruka, Levi, Syöte, Pallas and Ylläs. I think the best of them is Ylläs.

Ylläs

Ylläs

Ylläs is about 719m high mountain in Lapland, Kolari. Ylläs has 63 slopes. The top is divided into two sides. On the other side is Äkäslompolo, called Ylläs-Ski and on the side is Ylläsjärvi, called Sport Resort Ylläs. Ylläs has the longest slope in Finland, which is 3 kilometers long. There is a Gondoli lift and a new chair lift on the Sport Resort Ylläs.

Snowboarding in Europe

Austria and Switzerland

There are many different ski resorts in Europe. They are much bigger than the centers in Finland. I have been snowboarding in Switzerland and Austria in Europe. Next, I dream of snowboarding trip to Italy and Sweden.

Austria

Austria

Maria Alm is a charming skiing town in Austria. The nearby Hochköning ski center offered wonderful scenery and long slopes. The highest point in the center was at an altitude of just over 1,900 meters. Bad Gastein and the Kitzsteinhorn glacier in Zell Am See was also a wonderful experience.

More information of Kitzsteinhorn Glacier
Switzerland

Switzerland

We stayed in Leysin. Switzerland is beautiful and snowy, although it is a really expensive country.

Snowboarding is wonderful!
